div.p: ITB was actively developed the Indonesian Internet community since it became an AI3 partner. It connected tens of research and education institutions in Indonesia to the Internet via AI3 using 802.11 WLAN for institutions in Bandung and VSAT links for institutions outside the city.

ITB implemented Ganesha Digital Library (GDL), an electronic library application, and developed Indonesian Digital Library Network (IDLN) using this application. ITB is also involved in the development of IPv6 in Indonesia.
